places_with_reviews.name: GREEN ORAA HOMESTAY AHWA
address: 37, Sunset Road, beside Seva dham, Hilltop Society, Shastry Colony, Ahwa, Gujarat 394710, India

reviews.text:
Best in Ahwa.
If you're willing to stay Ahwa or Saputara, stay here. Best view and rooms

Nice place, Nice people,, very friendly Bharat bhai, I must thank you for tea on closed Saturday of Ahwa. Be aware that last Saturday  Ahwa market will be totally closed even now tea stall will be open. Very nice view and locality.

Thank you so much Bharat bhai and Sharmila ji🙏 It's the best place to stay at Ahwa. It's a homestay with the feel of home. We stayed there for a few weeks. Their home is ideally situated, just around the famous sunset point. I enjoy photography, and got a few amazing shots of the sunset and surrounding nature. The cherry on top is that the owners are really caring and loving. The rooms are airy, beautiful, clean, and with an attached bathroom. I'll always remember this place. It was a wonderful stay. Thank you again 🙏🙏

Size of room too big
Cleanliness excallant
Hospitality nice
Feel safe like home.
Only bad thing is the aproach to green orra stay is too small and drive through is tough if cars comes from both end
But though i can say i will come again if i plan ahwa
Stay was comfortable. Basic rooms and friendly staff. No food available. Had to arrange it from outside.

reviews.text: A great place for stay with comfortable rooms and good food as vell the location is also great for night stay during traveling or exploring the Dang 🤩
Neat and clean area  Rooms available for stay at reasonable prices..with parking facility... offering various Punjabi, gujarati, chinese delicious food .👌🏻

Nice place on nature's lap.
Once visit with family
